body.p: Lua can be used to define actions which darktable will perform whenever a specified event is triggered. One example might be calling an external application during file export in order to apply additional processing steps outside of darktable.

darktable uses
Lua , which is an independent project founded in 1993, providing a powerful, fast, lightweight, embeddable scripting language. Lua is widely used by many open source applications, in commercial programs, and for games programming.
darktable uses Lua version 5.2. Describing the principles and syntax of Lua is beyond the scope of this usermanual. For a detailed introduction see the Lua reference manual.
